thread.title: Panoptes Digital Partners with Itransition to Fuel Up Its PD AssetTracker Product Line
thread.title_full: Panoptes Digital Partners with Itransition to Fuel Up Its PD AssetTracker Product Line - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Panoptes Digital Partners with Itransition to Fuel Up Its PD AssetTracker Product Line
text:
Panoptes Digital Partners with Itransition to Fuel Up Its PD AssetTracker Product Line
Itransition enhances new technologies for healthcare solution providers.
Frisco, TX, September 01, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Panoptes Digital, an innovative supply chain and logistics management software provider, is pleased to announce a new long-term partnership with Itransition , a global provider of application and software product development services. For the past year Panoptes Digital has engaged in beta testing of its PD AssetTracker product line with customers in the healthcare space. Itransition will take what was learned in the beta tests and combine it with requests from new customers to create a more robust product that can better handle the dynamic needs of Panoptes Digital’s clients moving forward.
"Increased customer interest has allowed us to move forward with an outside software vendor that will help us to rapidly accelerate the pace of our development," said Steve Worster, Panoptes Digital's President and CEO. “To that end we have retained Itransition as a perfect partner to help us handle our current opportunities and to assist us with future growth. The newest version of PD AssetTracker will also assist us to further develop our separately branded anti-counterfeiting and immediate recall notice product lines which will also be handled by Itransition.”
“Over the years we have delivered diverse solutions and services to software vendors across the globe, accelerating their time-to-market,expanding their reach and increasing RoI,” added Denis Kostusev, VP of Business Development at Itransition. “We are committed to invest all our efforts to boost the brilliant business ideas Panoptes Digital has with our software services, based on the latest technologies, industry trends and best practices.”
Panoptes Digital is an early stage company with the mission to create a safer, more authentic and more transparent supply chain. With the input from its early customers, insight from Itransition and top notch legal support from Vela Keller, Panoptes Digital is gradually building a new way for businesses and consumers to utilize and developed their supply chain.
About Panoptes Digital
Panoptes Digital was founded in 2013 by a core group of professionals with years of experience in a wide variety of domestic and international industries and public sector service, including: Information and physical security, logistics, software development, implementation and management, legal compliance, law enforcement, military and national security. The Panoptes team is also uniquely experienced in pharmaceutical and supply chain compliance and security, and is growing its existing logistics “big data” capture, management, and analytics capabilities. To learn more, please visit:panoptesdigital.com
About Itransition
Founded in 1998, Itransition is a rapidly-growing global provider of application and software product development services headquartered in the USA. The company delivers high quality services to customers from start-ups and SMEs to large corporations from Western Europe and North America through its 1,300 strong development center in Eastern Europe, offering a well-balanced blend of technology skills, domain knowledge, effective methodology, and passion for IT. Itransition is continuously recognized as a leader in outsourced software development by independent research agencies. For instance, subsequent to the results of 2014, the company scored best in the Customer Reference and Company Certification categories and headed the list of the Rising Stars of the 2015 Global Outsourcing List, as well as was included in Inc 5000 among the fastest growing and most successful private companies of the USA. For details, please visit www.itransition.com
